meta.title: Our Services - 5R Associates
meta.description: Residential construction, interiors, painting, fabrication, renovations, and project management by 5R Associates.

header.title: Our Services
header.subtitle: Essential residential services crafted with quality and care

construction.title: Residential Construction
construction.description: New builds and extensions for homes and apartments, managed end-to-end.

painting.title: Painting Services
painting.description: Interior and exterior painting with prep, priming, and premium finishes.

interior.title: Interior Design
interior.description: Space planning, material selection, and lighting for functional, stylish homes.

fabrication.title: MS and SS Fabrication
fabrication.description: Custom mild and stainless steel work for gates, railings, and structural elements.

renovations.title: Renovations
renovations.description: Upgrades and makeovers that modernize spaces while respecting the existing structure.

management.title: Project Management
management.description: Scheduling, budgeting, vendor coordination, and quality checks to keep work on track.

coverage.title: Service Coverage
coverage.description: We deliver projects across multiple locations:

cta.title: Need Expert Residential Services?
cta.description: Tell us about your project—we'll plan, budget, and deliver with care.
